name: Flicky Shot - Archery Arrow Mannequin Challenge
name_original: Flicky Shot - Archery Arrow Mannequin Challenge
description:
Shoot the Mannequin with arrows! Avoid hitting the other arrows! Easy one tap gameplay that is great for all ages!

[How to Play]
•Tap the screen to shoot the arrow
•Number on top left shows how many arrows left to complete the level!
•Avoid hitting the other arrows!

[Features]
•Easy to learn but hard to master!
•Casual and addictive gameplay that's suitable for all ages
•Check back for new levels and special updates!

Follow us for updates and new games!
